titleStmt.title: To the Parliament, the most humble remonstrance of Sr. Balthazar Gerbier, Kt.
titleStmt.author: Gerbier, Balthazar, Sir, 1592?-1667.

notesStmt.note: An abstract of financial schemes, etc., submitted by Gerbier to the Council of State.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
